member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Service.ISiplaceSetupCenter.RegisterChangeoverTable(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.RegisterChangeoverTableRequest)
member.summary: Registers the specified changeover table (COT) to the specified station location. Before calling this function the COT has to be placed into the location.
member.param: Request object containing the Machine ID, Station location number" and table Id
member.returns: The Result.ResultItems contain a ResultItem. The ResultItem.State indicates if the operation was successful. The ResultItem.State contains the following values: 1 : OK 2 : Error In case of error the ResultItem.Messages will contain the reason of the failure.
member.remarks: This method is only supported for Setup Center 9.8 and higher.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Service.ISiplaceSetupCenter.MoveChangeoverTableIntoStationLocation(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.MoveChangeoverTableIntoStationLocationRequest)
member.summary: Moves the specified changeover table (COT) into the specified station location. Before calling this function the COT has to be placed into the location so that the machine can pull in it automatically.
member.param: Request object containing the Machine ID and Station location number
member.returns: The Result.ResultItems contain a ResultItem. The ResultItem.State indicates if the operation was successful. The ResultItem.State contains the following values: 1 : OK 2 : Error In case of error the ResultItem.Messages will contain the reason of the failure.
member.remarks: This method is only supported for Setup Center 9.8 and higher.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Service.ISiplaceSetupCenter.MoveChangeoverTableOutOfStationLocation(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.MoveChangeoverTableOutOfStationLocationRequest)
member.summary: Moves the specified changeover table (COT) out of the specified station location. After this function is successfully completed the COT can be removed from location
member.param: Request object containing the Machine ID and Station location number
member.returns: The Result.ResultItems contain a ResultItem. The ResultItem.State indicates if the operation was successful. The ResultItem.State contains the following values: 1 : OK 2 : Error In case of error the ResultItem.Messages will contain the reason of the failure.
member.remarks: This method is only supported for Setup Center 9.8 and higher.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Service.ISiplaceSetupCenter.GetChangeOverTablesOfActiveSetup(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.GetChangeOverTablesOfActiveSetupRequest)
member.summary: Gets the changeover table (COT) information of the active recipe. If the prepared COTs are not already registered this function will return the prepared COTs. If a location has no COT then it will be omitted in the returned list! The logic is: 1. If a COT is registered to a station location then return it 2. Otherwise check if a COT is prepared in pre-setup area for the active setup and return it. 3. Otherwise return null.
member.param: Request object containing a list of machine IDs
member.returns: Result object containing a list of TableLocations per machine id
member.remarks: This method is only supported for Setup Center 9.8 and higher.

member.name: T:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Service.IWaferMapExternalControl
member.summary: Interface for WaferMap MES applications which want to do handling of wafer maps. If a wafer is placed at the station the station will send an event to Setup Center to request the wafer map. Setup Center gets the wafer map from the MES and forwards it to the station. The station uses the information of the wafer map during production. It sends updates of the wafer map to Setup Center. Setup Center forwards the updated wafer map to the MES. The wafer map is handled as a string containing an xml representation of the wafer map. The xml representation follows the standard SEMI G85-0703.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Service.IWaferMapExternalControl.Ping(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.PingRequest)
member.summary: The ping function performs a check, if the connection to the underlying system components is alive or not

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Service.IWaferMapExternalControl.GetWaferMap(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.GetWaferMapRequest)
member.summary: Called in case a wafer is placed at the station and the station needs the wafer map to continue. The wafer map is returned as a string containing an xml representation of the wafer map. The xml representation follows the standard SEMI G85-0703.

member.name: M:Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Service.IWaferMapExternalControl.UpdateWaferMap(Asm.As.Oib.SiplaceSetupCenter.Contracts.Data.UpdateWaferMapRequest)
member.summary: Called in case a wafer is updated by the station because of production. The wafer map is provided as a string containing an xml representation of the wafer map. The xml representation follows the standard SEMI G85-0703.
